text: I remember first year me tu humare room pe aata tha and sote hue me photo le jaata tha meri aur patel ki ğŸ˜‚... Bhai bohot mast memories hain tere saath...starting days me late night cycle chalane and the song Musafir, sab yaad rahega. I'm certain you'll do great things in life. Hope to see you soon!
author: Nishchay  Selot

text:
Bhai Bhai Bhai...
Kya hi bolun me...4 saal me itni bakchodiyan teri dekh k itna seekhne ko mila hai! Itna bhola sa aaya tha tu, tujhe ekdum boss ğŸ˜ bante dekha hai...aur bhai vo raat to kaise bhul sakte hain jab tune bund hi phhaad di thi humari! Par kuchh bhi kaho, tujhse generous aur supportive nhi dekha bhai koi aur idhar. Bohot yaad aayega tu, aur tere dialogue ğŸ˜‚ (sada jeevan uchh vichaar !ğŸ™)
author: Nishchay  Selot

text: Arre barwal! You're the first person I met here and have been real fun all these years. From realising that akhilesh was a playah in the first few days to taking awkward concert photos, you've been amazing! Tu pakka bohot bada aadmi banega. Hope to see you soon someday!
author: Nishchay  Selot
